page.title: 09RECREATION - SPORT 2
page.content: Sport is thought of as an important pastime for young people, and in the last year a co-ordinator has been appointed by the Sports Club to liase with local youth groups and the school in order to better provide for the latters' sporting needs. The new Sports Pavilion at the Recreation Field has taken 7 years to build largely by the Sports Club members' own labour and at a cost of Â£22,000, raised by the members themselves. Nearby is the Rifle Range, built 4 years ago, by its members' own labour and fund raising. Three teams, as well as individuals and pairs enter competitions. Outdoor shooting is a traditional pastime, with most of the farmers raising their own pheasants for the shoot. One farmer employs a gamekeeper.
